forum.content:
will shape myself into your pocket
我會將自己形塑成你想要的樣子
Invisible,
偷偷的，不著痕跡的
do what you want,
成為你心裡所描繪出的形狀
do what you want
成為你心裡希冀已久的樣貌
I will shrink and I will disappear
我會慢慢的縮小然後消失，不著痕跡的。
I will slip into the groove
再陷入那稱心的事上
and cut me up,
再把我切碎
and cut me up
再把我切碎
There's an empty space inside my heart
在我心中有一塊空閒的地
Where the weeds take root
那裏雜草叢生
And now I'll set you free
現在我放你自由
I'll set you free
讓你自由
There's an empty space inside my heart
在我心中有一塊空閒的地
Where the weeds take root
那裏雜草叢生
And now I'll set you free
現在我放你自由
I'll set you free
讓你自由
Slowly we unfurl
我們緩慢的伸展
As lotus flowers
就像蓮花一樣
'Cause all I want is the moon upon a stick
因為我想要的可能就如月亮那般，遠在天邊。
Just to see what if
只想知道該如何是好
Just to see what is
只想知道該物為何物
I can't kick your habit
我不能戒絕你的癮
Just to feed your fast ballooning head
只能滿足你那急速膨脹卻沒腦子的腦袋
Listen to your heart
傾聽你的心
We will sink and be quiet as mice
我們隱沒，如群膽小怕死老鼠般安靜。
While the cat is away;
當優雅的貓遠離了
do what we want
我們又想要些什麼
Do what we want
我們又能做些什麼
There's an empty space inside my heart
在我心中有一塊空閒的地
Where the weeds take root
那裏雜草叢生
And now I'll set you free
現在我放你自由
I'll set you free
讓你自由
There's an empty space inside my heart
在我心中有一塊空閒的地
Where the weeds take root
那裏雜草叢生
And now I'll set you free
現在我放你自由
I'll set you free
讓你自由
Slowly we unfurl
我們緩慢的伸展
As lotus flowers
就如蓮花一般
'Cause all I want is the moon upon a stick
因為我想要的可能就如月亮那般，遠在天邊。
Just to see what if
只想知道該如何是好
Just to see what is
只想知道該物為何物
Put the lotus flower into my room
將蓮花置滿我的房間
(字太多以下至留言區)

urls.description: Video for 'Lotus Flower' from The King of Limbs Produced and Directed by Garth Jennings Choreographe
urls.title: Radiohead - Lotus Flower

forum.title: Radiohead - Lotus Flowers
